glosses: Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see yok, -sa or ise.

examples.translation: If you have no money I can't help you.

examples.text: Sen de sakinleş. Yoksa bir taraflarımız tehlike içinde kalacak.
examples.translation: You calm down. Otherwise, one of us will be in danger.

examples.text: Bir hastane odası mıydı, yoksa hapishane mi?
examples.translation: Was it a hospital room, or a prison?

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یوقسه, from Old Anatolian Turkish یوخیسه (yoḫısa). By surface analysis, yok + -sa, literally “if not (existing)”, equivalent to yok + ise.
